name: bounceGame (Jonathan Hirz)
description: I recently found some old haxeflixel source code and a couple of binaries. This is the only compiled, playable, finished game I had in the directory. I know I have shared this before, but for some reason I had taken it down. Figured I would toss it up here for fun along with the source code. No guarantees it will even compile anymore, I'm sure things have changed with haxeflixel since I have used it. Have fun!
